title: Ayling: Great to face 'one of the greatest' Ronaldo
shortDescription: Luke Ayling told Sky Sports what the chance to face "one of the greatest" in Cristiano Ronaldo will mean as Leeds host old rivals Man Utd on Super Sunday.

title: Papers: Ronaldo to leave Man Utd if they miss out on top four
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Sunday's national newspapers...

title: Carra: Kane's performance best of the season | Pep: Time to forget about him
shortDescription: Jamie Carragher believes Harry Kane produced one of the best performances of the season in Tottenham's stunning 3-2 win at Manchester City.

title: Former Oxford winger Beauchamp dies aged 50
shortDescription: Oxford United have paid tribute to their former winger Joey Beauchamp, who has died at the age of 50.

title: PSG suffer shock defeat at Nantes | Atletico bounce back
shortDescription: Paris Saint-Germain suffer shock defeat at Nantes as Atletico Madrid get back to winning ways.

title: PL hits & misses: Complete Kane, anonymous Lukaku
shortDescription: Harry Kane showed his completeness to inspire Spurs against Man City while Romelu Lukaku broke an unwanted Premier League record...

title: Carra: PL title race back on | Conte can turn Spurs into major force
shortDescription: Jamie Carragher would still favour Manchester City to defend their Premier League crown, but says Tottenham's 3-2 win has sparked life into the title race.

title: Saints breeze past Everton | Lampard: We're in relegation fight
shortDescription: Stuart Armstrong and Shane Long scored rare Premier League goals to give Southampton a deserved 2-0 win over a disappointing Everton at St Mary's.

title: Kane hits City with late knockout blow to ignite PL title race
shortDescription: Harry Kane came back to haunt long-term suitors Manchester City as his stoppage-time strike earned Tottenham a 3-2 victory in a pulsating clash at the Etihad Stadium.

title: Salah nets 150th Liverpool goal in comeback win over Norwich
shortDescription: Mohamed Salah scored his 150th Liverpool goal with Sadio Mane and Luis Diaz also on target as the Reds came from behind to beat Norwich at Anfield.

title: Back Maguire to score header at 20/1  - Jones Knows
shortDescription: Our tipster Jones Knows has his eyes on two bets in Leeds vs Manchester United involving Paul Pogba and Harry Maguire.

title: Watford beat Villa to boost survival hopes as Hodgson registers first win
shortDescription: Emmanuel Dennis's late header saw struggling Watford win 1-0 at Aston Villa as Roy Hodgson recorded his first win in charge of the Hornets.

title: PL Predictions: Why Spurs can stop the Man City machine
shortDescription: Jones Knows thinks the odds surrounding Tottenham's chances of avoiding defeat at Man City are too good to pass up in this week's Premier League predictions.

title: Arteta on top-four race: 'Long way to go'
shortDescription: Mikel Arteta refused to get carried away in the race for the Premier League top four after Arsenal beat Brentford.

title: Ziyech snatches late win at Palace | Tuchel: We're exhausted
shortDescription: Hakim Ziyech’s volley in the 89th-minute snatched a late 1-0 win for newly-crowned world champions Chelsea at Crystal Palace.

title: Brilliant Burnley boost survival bid with win at Brighton
shortDescription: Burnley breathed life into their Premier League survival bid as an 11-game winless run in the top flight was brought to an emphatic end with a 3-0 victory at Brighton.

title: Smith Rowe and Saka boost Arsenal's top-four hopes
shortDescription: Arsenal kept their bid for Champions League qualification firmly on track with a 2-1 victory against Brentford at the Emirates Stadium.

title: Kiltie grabs point at Livi as St Mirren begin life after Goodwin
shortDescription: Greg Kiltie’s late goal secured St Mirren a draw at Livingston after losing manager Jim Goodwin to Aberdeen earlier in the day.

title: Goodwin begins Dons tenure with draw at Motherwell
shortDescription: Jim Goodwin will now start to shape the future of Aberdeen after his tenure as boss began with a 1-1 cinch Premiership draw against Motherwell at Fir Park.

title: Ince takes charge as Reading sack Paunovic despite win
shortDescription: Paul Ince will take temporary charge of Reading after Veljko Paunovic was sacked in the wake of the Royals' 3-2 win at Preston on Saturday.
